question: I like this person,I did Istikhara on him and it came out positive he likes me as well.I want to get married to him and I was wondering if you can give me a Dua so that we can get married soon
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Read, ?rabb inniy lima anzalta ilayya min kahyrin faqeer?.

Do not keep any ties with him or even speak to him until you are married. May Allah bless your marriage.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
